meta.description: Buy airport lounge access. Learn how to access Singapore Changi Airport (SIN) lounges with a day pass, airline status, membership, or credit card.

location.terminalDirections: At the end of Terminal 2, follow the road signs to the security gate
Located on Level 1, near Lift Lobby E, opposite the early Check-in counters.

lounges.name: British Airways Singapore Lounge and Concorde Bar

location.terminalDirections: Turn left after Immigration, take the lift or escalator to Level 3.

Located directly above the Departure Immigration Area of the Departure Transit Hall. After Departure Immigration, turn right and take the escalator up one level. The lounge will be located across from the Crystal Jade La Mian Xiao Long Bao Restaurant.
Departure/Transit Lounge West, Level 3, above Gate C1.
Located near the D Gates.
Departure Transit Hall on Level 3 near Transfer C
After Immigration Control, turn left. Take the escalator opposite TWG Tea Boutique up to the lounge entrance on Level 2.
Located in the departure area above Boarding Gate C1.
Turn left after Passport Control, take the lift or escalator to Level 3.
Take Lift 25 to the entrance on Level 3 (lift is located near the Orchid Garden, between DFS Wine & Spirits and Bee Cheng Hiang).
After Immigration Control, turn left. Take the escalator opposite Charles & Keith up to the lounge entrance on Level 3.
Departure Transit Lounge, Level 3.

lounges.name: Singapore Airlines SilverKris Business Class Lounge

location.terminalDirections: Take escalators located near the Enchanted Garden to access the lounge entrance on Level 3.

lounges.name: Singapore Airlines SilverKris First Class Lounge

location.terminalDirections: Take escalators located near the Enchanted Garden to access the lounge entrance on Level 3.

Departure Transit Hall, Level 3. Located at the east/north end of Terminal 3 next to the Butterfly Garden. Access via escalator or lift located near the B gate corridors, and next to Wines and Spirits by DFS. Located close to the Ambassador Transit Hotel.

3rd floor inside the departure/transit area. Turn left and head up escalators or lift near Cosmetics and Perfumes by Shilla Duty Free. Located across the hallway from the Singapore Airlines Krisflyer Gold Lounge.
After Passport Control, find the escalator on the right - between Louis Vuitton and DFS. Proceed up to Level 3, and the lounge is located opposite Singapore Food Street.
After Immigration Control, turn left. Take the escalator beside Shilla Cosmetics Duty Free up to the lounge entrance on Level 3.
Departure/Transit Hall, Level 3. Located between the SATS Premier Lounge and Louis Vuitton.

lounges.name: Singapore Airlines SilverKris Business Class Lounge

location.terminalDirections: Inside the Departure/Transit Hall, 3rd Floor. After immigration, turn left and head up escalators or lift near Cosmetics and Perfumes by Shilla Duty Free. Go down the corridor to the left past the SATS Premier Lounge, DBS Treasures Lounge, and Singapore Airlines Krisflyer Gold Lounge.

lounges.name: Singapore Airlines SilverKris First Class Lounge

location.terminalDirections: Inside the Departure/Transit Hall, 3rd Floor. After immigration, turn left and head up escalators or lift near Cosmetics and Perfumes by Shilla Duty Free. Go down the corridor to the left. The lounge is located before the SATS Premier Lounge.
Departure/Transit Hall, Level 3. Located inside the Singapore Airlines First Class Lounge.
After the Security Checkpoint, located on the Mezzanine Level, adjacent to the Cathay Pacific Lounge.
Departure Transit Hall, Mezzanine Level
